sentence.Network_en: He can see tolerably well and he can read.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的视力还算可以，还能看书。

sentence.Network_en: The system is working tolerably well.

· 公差 (Tolerances) - 这些是与公差格式相关的参数。当尺寸由数字的转向符号的时候出项这些符号。

entry.def: If you describe something as tolerable, you mean that you can bear it, even though it is unpleasant or painful.

example.ex: The levels of tolerable pain vary greatly from individual to individual…
example.tran: 对疼痛的耐受程度因人而异，差别很大。

example.ex: He described their living conditions as tolerable.
example.tran: 他把他们的生活条件描述为“尚可忍受”。

entry.def: If you describe something as tolerable, you mean that it is fairly good and reasonably satisfactory, but not of the highest quality or standard.

example.ex: He fell asleep just past midnight with tolerable ease...
example.tran: 他刚过午夜就睡着了，睡得还算安稳。

example.ex: Is there anywhere tolerable to eat in town?
example.tran: 城里有什么过得去的地方可以吃饭吗？

means.word_mean: 2. in an acceptable (but not outstanding) manner;

sentences.en: The system is working tolerably well.
